title: Understanding Psychosocial Assessment
text: A psychosocial assessment evaluates various aspects of a person's life that can affect their mental health. Consider factors that influence daily living and personal well-being.

title: Key Areas to Consider
text: Think about the different environments and activities that a person engages in. These can include their home life, work or school, and leisure activities.

title: Substance Use and Identity
text: Consider how a person's use of substances like drugs, tobacco, or alcohol, as well as their understanding of their own sexuality and gender, might be relevant to their psychosocial assessment.
